this customer you don't need all of that resource um straight away or if ever

more than you can use and at the moment an ise is really the only way to get that network isolation with logic apps
and to be able to get that vnet integration doesn't really exist on the consumption-based tier of logic apps
so what this customer is going to be doing pretty much along with anybody who's using an ise

active active model and that's expensive and more complicated again so i think this is an example not only
of more and more companies moving to those multi-tenant services with v-net integration
for network isolation i i also think it's an example of more and more companies moving to serverless pricing
tiers so that they can be able to you know put up more services and also tear down
those services more easily not just for disaster recovery but also for being able to deploy
